channel.title: SpRestLib Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest SpRestLib news and events.

item.title: Adding a User to SharePoint Group Using REST with SpRestLib
item.description: Adding a User to an existing SharePoint Group can be done using a SpRestLib REST call in just a few lines of code.

item.title: Creating SharePoint jQuery People-Picker with SpRestLib
item.description: Create a fully-functional People Picker against your local SharePoint ActiveDirectory structure using jQuery-UI autocomplete and SpRestLib.

item.title: Creating SharePoint List Columns Using REST
item.description: List and Library fields/columns can be created using the REST API. A feature which is especially useful in many scenarios, such as having to update many subsites with new fields, doing migration work, etc.

item.title: Uploading a file to a SharePoint library using REST
item.description: Howto upload a file into a SharePoint Library using REST. Both Node.js and client browsers can encode and upload files easily.
